entry.title: SAS: Succinct Atomic Swap
entry.summary: Ruben has extended the standard TLC contract by introducing a crucial factor where Alice reveals a secret when she refunds. The original contract had three steps - Bob redeems with secret, Alice refunds after T1, and Bob redeems without secret after T2. In Ruben's extension, the steps are Bob redeems with redeem secret, Alice refunds after T1 with refund secret, and Bob redeems without secret after T2.
